review_details: We met up with them at the dock and promptly got on the boat and had coffee and cake. After visiting for a few minutes we were off to find the nets. They reeled in the net and we got to pick the fish out. Many varieties and sizes. After we finished the nets they motored over to a nice cove for swimming and lunch. Wonderful food! Fresh caught fish cooked to perfection. At the end of the day we motored back to the dock! It was an excellent day. Wonderful hosts!
Nick was a fantastic guide and our teenager even enjoyed the day! Nice to see sights not on other tours.
After 8 days in the area, for medical procedures, we found Fiddies! Excellent Italian food and wonderful staff! We will return in a few weeks when we come back to the area from Bucharest.
The tour was good and transportation great. It was nice to have someone else in charge of getting everything planned and executed.

Diana was our guide for the Sibiu walking tour. She is very informative and was willing to answer our many questions about Sibiu and the history of the area. I would highly recommend this tour to anyone new to Sibiu or visiting for the first time.
